name: Determine the shape and calculate its area
description:
In this kata your task is to write a code which will determine the correct shape and calculate its area. 
Input arguments will always be positive floats. If one of the input values is equal to zero, that means the shape in mind doesn't use it.
Only four shapes will be tested: square, circle, rectangle and 90 45 45 triangle.
Your code should return the name of the shape and its area in a string as shown in the example below:

```python
shape_area(4.00, 2.5, 0.00), "Rectangle with area of 10"
```
Area should be rounded (as a whole number), meaning both 5.00 and 5.60 should be returned as 5.
Input arguments are always given from left to right, meaning that if an argument is equal to zero, it's always the most right one/ones. 

If the given shape is a circle, area should be returned as shown in the example below:
```python
shape_area(3.00, 0.00, 0.00), "Circle with area of 9pi"
```
Quick reminder - don't forget to check if the given arguments can be sides of a triangle or at least of a right one. If they can't, return None, same as when all arguments are equal to 0.
